include.name: Slide1.2
include.description: Fanart fix for internal windows while video player is visible

includes.include: Conditional Conditional Conditional Conditional Conditional Conditional Conditional Conditional--> Conditional Conditional Conditional Conditional

animation.condition: Skin.HasSetting(TopInformationSize) + [[Skin.String(MenuDesign,0) | Skin.String(MenuDesign,1) | Skin.String(MenuDesign,7)] + [[!Container(9000).Row(0) + !Container(9000).Row(1) | Container(9000).HasPrevious()] | [[Container(9000).Row(0) | Container(9000).Row(1)] + !Container(9000).HasPrevious() + Player.HasVideo]]]
